articles.title: NNSA seeks proposals for ai data centers, energy projects at Savannah River Site
articles.author: Carl Dawson
articles.summary: The National Nuclear Security Administration is looking for private sector partners to build and power Artificial Intelligence data centers at the Savannah River Site. The RFP is titled 'Artificial Intelligence Infrastructure and Energy Generation on DOE Land at Savannah River Sites' and closes on December 5th. SRS was one of four sites chosen to accelerate the development of AI infrastructure on DOE lands.
